|| Idea || Box set compiling ''[[Apple Venus Volume 1]]'' and ''[[Wasp Star (Apple Venus Volume 2)]]'' along with their demo albums ''[[Homespun]]'' and ''[[Homegrown (XTC album)|Homegrown]]'' |- ! colspan=5|"â" denotes a release that did not chart. |} == Fuzzy Warbles albums == The "[[The Official Fuzzy Warbles Collector's Album|Fuzzy Warbles]]" series is a collection of demos and sketches from Andy Partridge's tape archive. They do not include any of Colin Moulding's songs and are produced and compiled by Partridge. *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 1]]''''' (2002) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 2]]''''' (2002) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 3]]''''' (2003) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 4]]''''' (2003) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 5]]''''' (2004) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 6]]''''' (2004) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 7]]''''' (2006) *'''''[[Fuzzy Warbles Volume 8]]''''' (2006) *'''''[[Hinges (album)|Hinges]]''''' (2006) == Other compilations == * ''Eighties Goldies'' (1980) A French Cassette-Only Compilation of the first six Singles & B-sides. * ''The Tiny Circus of Life'' (1992) Limited French compilation. * ''[[Left of the Dial: Dispatches from the '80s Underground]]'' (2004) includes Senses Working Overtime == Singles == Where available, chart positions are given for each country of release. (Moulding) | | | | | | | |align=left|Internet-only release. |style="background:#ddd;" align=left|Non-album release |} == EPs == * ''[[3D - EP]]'' (7 October 1977) * ''Go +'' (October 1978) 6-song EP of dub mixes, included with first edition of ''Go2'', reissued on ''Explode Together'' * ''[[Live & More EP]]'' (April 1981 â Japan Only) * ''[[5 Senses EP]]'' (September 1981 â Canada Only) * ''[[Demo Tracks]]'' (July 1992 â Japan Only) * ''A Hello Selection'' (November 1994) (Andy Partridge) limited edition 4-song EP of demos, only available to members of [[They Might Be Giants]]' Hello Recording Club ==References== {{Reflist|refs= {{cite web | title=Chart Stats: XTC | url=http://www.chartstats.com/artistinfo.php?id=3121 | work=Chart Stats | accessdate=12 August 2011}} }} == External links == * [http://chalkhills.org/discog/ XTC Discography] at chalkhills.org
